title: Mystery Guest Joins The Cigar Authority
itunes:title: Mystery Guest Joins The Cigar Authority
description:
You've heard us hype up over the last few weeks the fact that we have a mystery guest joining us. Today is the day that all the secrets will be let out of the bag as our guest will tell you everything you wanted to know and perhaps things you wish you would have never known.

We will smoke a cigar in the first hour that has ties to our guest, and is as rare as they come. In the second hour we will light up Studio 21 from the Care Package and hear the story behind the brand and the lawsuits that followed.

ll that and the usual bag of tricks Debonaire Mr. J, Asylum Barry, Cigar News, Classic 3 Way and even a few mail bags..

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
